entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
